Dearï»¿ mans! I have a problem! In the derivation in excel format I have a problem with the URL in the cells ... ie I write ...

$ ObjPHPExcel-> getActiveSheet () -> getCell ('C'. $ I.'')-> getHyperlink () -> setUrl ('http://phpexcel.codeplex.com/discussions?searchText=URL');


but the color of links has only black in Excel (visited, active, hover), and links without underscores. Should be the standard blue for links.
If you change the URL for a cell in Excel, then I see a blue link

Thanks in advance mans!

PHPExcel isn't Excel with its automatic changes to style when you set a hyperlink. The getHyperlink()->setUrl() method only sets the hyperlink, it doesn't change the styling of the cell in any way. You need to change the font colour, underline style, etc by hand.
Well, I also did. But in Excel, I saw the state of "visited" (standart color for hyperlink)! How to make it emulate?
